title: Good Omens - I Do Adore ANIMATIC
author: Sushi Cat333
comment: Oh god, this is absolutely the cheesiest, corniest, most unrelentingly fluffy animatic I have ever seen, but please do not apologize for it because it made my heart sprout wings and ascend to Heaven.
LOVE THIS SONG. LOVE THE SHOW. LOVE YOUR ANIMATIC.
This needs more attention, it's so pure.

All of the most adorably drawn faces :

0:10 
When he's laughing it's so precious.

AHHH I WAS JUST THINKING ABOUT THIS SONG THE OTHER DAY 
It’s so wholesome :>
description:
Happy Valentine's Day! This was a really quick thing I made in two days. Its my first time using clip studio paint for an animatic and I definitely feel like I have a lot to learn. 
Also, two videos in a week?? I must be on drugs or something lmao

Mindy Gledhill- I Do Adore:
